Package hvtools

Interface Summary
Cmd Interface to store HVframe command set
HVListener  
 

Class Summary
DecimalField Implements format input of digital numbers for table
ErrorMessages Implements few methods to print error messages to stderror
FormattedDocument Implements methods to get and check formatted input from user
HVFrameList Implements methods to manipulate with list of hvframe hostnames
HVListDialog Use this modal dialog to let the user choose one string from a long list.
HVStatus HVStatus displays list of strings with current status of HV system
Parameters Parameters - implements methods to load/save properties from/to file
UpAttribute UpAttribute implements methods to store, geting, setting hvchannels attributes
